directions: Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, cumin, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until dressing is smooth; add carrots, chickpeas, parsley, and onion and toss to coat.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (14 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained and rinsed
title: Quick and Easy Carrot and Chickpea Salad
